subject: Re: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
msgSnippet: Wrap the test suite in a test setup object and override setUp() and tearDown() in the test setup object: public class MyTestSuite ... { public static Test
messageBody:
Wrap the test suite in a test setup object and override setUp() and
tearDown() in the test setup object:

public class MyTestSuite ... {
public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
...
TestSetup setup = new TestSetup(suite) {
protected void setUp() throws Exception {
// One-time setup code
}
protected void tearDown() throws Exception {
// One-time teardown code
}
};
return setup;
}
}

Hope this helps you more.
